verbs.description: Trump and Cohen [V: had] sought a delay because of a pending criminal investigation of Cohen by federal prosecutors in New York .
[ARG0: Trump and Cohen] had [V: sought] [ARG1: a delay] [ARGM-CAU: because of a pending criminal investigation of Cohen by federal prosecutors in New York] .
Trump and Cohen had sought a delay because of a [V: pending] [ARG1: criminal investigation] of Cohen by federal prosecutors in New York .
